name: ThunderBNB
description: THUNDERBNB is a double reward reflection token using the power of 80/20: 80% invest for now and mid term, 20% for long term future. Hold $THUNDERBNB tokens and get rewarded 20% in BNB (8% per buy & 12% per sell) and 5% in THOREUM (2% per buy & 3% per sell), automatically delivered to wallet every 60 minutes. THUNDERBNB is a part of Thunder Alliance Ecosystem including Thoreum, ThunderCake & ThunderBNB, supporting each other's price, increasing rarity & adding values together.
